## Vibrant notes of citrus and crisp acidity. Beguilingly crisp and sensuous, revel in the vibrant notes of tangerine, grapefruit, and citrus pith, accompanied by bright acidity and an invigorating demeanor. Perfect for a leisurely breakfast or an alluring date night. $28.00
